title: Create a Non-Conformance Report (NCR)
description: A part has failed a quality inspection. A quality engineer needs to create a Non-Conformance Report (NCR).

tasks.description: Start a new NCR and link it to the specific part, work order, and inspection result.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new NCR and links the relevant records.

tasks.description: Describe the defect in detail, attach evidence (photos, measurements), and assign a defect code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear description of the issue and attaches supporting files.

tasks.description: Route the NCR to the Material Review Board (MRB) for disposition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the NCR, and it appears in the queue for the MRB team.
